column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////So what is their best
column2: spicy miso ramen. The broth seems to originate from Tonkotsu (I am speculating
column3: my apology if I am wrong) but they blend the miso and added Japanese style miso very well
column4: so the broth is well balanced. This goes well with a thick noodle with mild waviness. The broth and the noodle are well matched
column5: and I can give a close to 4.5 out of 5 for this. So well done. And this is my favorite. It is better than Tiger Den. Tiger Den needs to create their own broth for miso ramen is my personal opinion. I like it
column6: but Tiger Den does have a new challenger.
